name: express-inversify-auth-ts-mysql-supertest
description: Sample web server using express, jwt auth, typescript, mysql, docker

scripts.pretest: npm run build-test && npm run lint
scripts.test-all: ALLOW_CONFIG_MUTATIONS=true TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true mocha --timeout 5000 --require ts-node/register --ignore test/config test/*.test.ts test/**/*.test.ts --exit
scripts.test-pick: ALLOW_CONFIG_MUTATIONS=true NODE_ENV=local TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true npx mocha --timeout 5000 --require ts-node/register --exit --async-only
scripts.coverage: rm -rf coverage; nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text-summary npm run test
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-ts
scripts.zip: rm -rf express-inversify-auth-ts-mysql-supertest .zip && npm run build && zip -r --exclude=\*.git\* --exclude=\*.DS_Store\*  express-inversify-auth-ts-mysql-supertest .zip .
